test-group.name: [1] {configmap_name=idm-config, key=SessionTimeout, value=1800, ACC=, k8s=, suite=, tags=relase:2017-07, Test Type: Kube-API}

test-step.description: Given a CD system is up
When I check the status of configmap {idm-config} under namespace "itsma1"
Then I get the {SessionTimeout} equals {1800}
